meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN - Park and Recreation Board Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Approval of the October 17, 2024, Arts and Culture Advisory Commission meeting minutes.
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Recommendation to initiate the planning process for a public art installation.
agenda_items.description: Planning for a public art installation to be located at the Dallas Police Academy in Council District 3, funded using 2024 Bond Funds.

agenda_items.title: Recommendation(s) for Quality of Life, Arts and Culture Committee regarding the FY 2024-25 Cultural Organizations Program funding allocation.
agenda_items.description: Funding allocation for Dallas Black Dance Theatre, Incorporated pursuant to remand by City Council on October 23, 2024.

financial_items.description: Funding for public art installation at the Dallas Police Academy.
